languages.text: "И после этого мне приходится доверять Дитя... вам?" {n}Старик шипит сквозь остатки зубов.{/n} "Очень уж похоже на проделки Фелека, и вы повелись на них! Или, быть может, знали обо всем заранее". {n}Теобальд бессильно сжимает кулаки.{/n} "Ничего, Регент Ааронто придумает, как избавить Дитя от сего проклятья".

traits.locale_text: "И после этого мне приходится доверять Дитя... вам?" {n}Старик шипит сквозь остатки зубов.{/n} "Очень уж похоже на проделки Фелека, и вы повелись на них! Или, быть может, знали обо всем заранее". {n}Теобальд бессильно сжимает кулаки.{/n} "Ничего, Регент Ааронто придумает, как избавить Дитя от сего проклятья".

languages.text: "And after this, I am supposed to give the Child to you?" {n}The old man hisses through the remains of his teeth.{/n} "This reeks of Felek's chicanery, and you fell for his tricks! Or perhaps you knew what would happen." {n}Theobald helplessly clenches his fists.{/n} "But, no matter, Regent Aaronto will find a way to rid the Child of this curse."
languages.original_text: "И после этого мне приходится доверять Дитя... вам?" {n}Старик шипит сквозь остатки зубов.{/n} "Очень уж похоже на проделки Фелека, и вы повелись на них! Или, быть может, знали обо всем заранее". {n}Теобальд бессильно сжимает кулаки.{/n} "Ничего, Регент Ааронто придумает, как избавить Дитя от сего проклятья".

traits.locale_text: "And after this I am supposed to give the Child... to you?" {n}The old man hisses through the remains of his teeth.{/n} "This reeks of Felek's chicanery, and you fell for his tricks! Or maybe you knew what would happen in advance." {n}Theobald helplessly clutches his fists.{/n} "But this is fine. Regent Aaronto will find a way to rid the Child of this curse."

"And after this I am supposed to give the Child... to you?" {n}The old man hisses through the remains of his teeth.{/n} "This reeks of Felek's chicanery, and you fell for his tricks! Or maybe you knew what would happen in advance." {n}Theobald helplessly clutches his fists.{/n} "But this is fine. Regent Aaronto will find a way to rid the Child of this curse."

"And after this, I am supposed to give the Child to you?" {n}The old man hisses through the remains of his teeth.{/n} "This reeks of Felek's chicanery, and you fell for his tricks! Or perhaps you knew what would happen." {n}Theobald helplessly clenches his fists.{/n} "But, no matter, Regent Aaronto will find a way to rid the Child of this curse."

"And after this, I am supposed to give the Child to you?" {n}The old man hisses through the remains of his teeth.{/n} "This reeks of Felek's chicanery, and you fell for his tricks! Or perhaps you knew what would happen." {n}Theobald helplessly clenches his fists.{/n} "But, no matter, Regent Aaronto will find a way to rid the Child of this curse."

"And after this, I am supposed to give the Child to you?" {n}The old man hisses through the remains of his teeth.{/n} "This reeks of Felek's chicanery, and you fell for his tricks! Or perhaps you knew what would happen." {n}Theobald helplessly clenches his fists.{/n} "But, no matter, Regent Aaronto will find a way to rid the Child of this curse."

languages.text: “发生了这样的事情，我还应该把圣子交给你吗？”{n}老人残存的牙齿发出了嘶嘶声。{/n}“这整件事情都是费雷克的阴谋，而你中了他的奸计！又或者，你早知道会是这样的结果。”{n}西奥巴德绝望地握紧了拳头。{/n}“不过，无论如何，阿伦托摄政王都会想办法解除圣子身上的诅咒。”
languages.original_text: "And after this, I am supposed to give the Child to you?" {n}The old man hisses through the remains of his teeth.{/n} "This reeks of Felek's chicanery, and you fell for his tricks! Or perhaps you knew what would happen." {n}Theobald helplessly clenches his fists.{/n} "But, no matter, Regent Aaronto will find a way to rid the Child of this curse."

traits.locale_text: “发生了这样的事情，我还应该把这孩子交给你吗？”{n}老人残存的牙齿发出了嘶嘶声。{/n}“这整件事情都是费雷克的阴谋，而你中了他的奸计！又或者，你早知道会是这样的结果。”{n}西奥巴德绝望地握紧了拳头。{/n}“不过，无论如何，阿伦托摄政王都会想办法解除这孩子身上的诅咒。”

languages.text: «Y, después de esto, ¿pretende que le entregue a la niña?». {n}El anciano masculla entre sus dientes restantes.{/n} «Esto apesta a las argucias de Felek, ¡y ha caído en sus trucos! O tal vez ya supiera lo que iba a ocurrir». {n}Theobald aprieta los puños con impotencia.{/n} «Pero no importa: el regente Aaronto encontrará la forma de librar a la niña de esta maldición».
languages.original_text: "And after this, I am supposed to give the Child to you?" {n}The old man hisses through the remains of his teeth.{/n} "This reeks of Felek's chicanery, and you fell for his tricks! Or perhaps you knew what would happen." {n}Theobald helplessly clenches his fists.{/n} "But, no matter, Regent Aaronto will find a way to rid the Child of this curse."

traits.locale_text: «Y, después de esto, ¿pretende que le entregue a la niña?». {n}El anciano masculla entre sus dientes restantes.{/n} «Esto apesta a las argucias de Felek, ¡y ha caído en sus trucos! O tal vez ya supiera lo que iba a ocurrir». {n}Theobald aprieta los puños con impotencia.{/n} «Pero no importa: el regente Aaronto encontrará la forma de librar a la niña de esta maldición».

languages.text: 「そして、この後は、御子をあなたに差し出さなくてはなりませんと言うのですか？」{n}老人は残った歯のすきまからシューッと音を立てる。{/n}「これはフェレックによる詐術だ、まんまとはめられましたな！それとも、承知の上でしたのか」{n}シオボールドは力なく手を握りしめる。{/n}「だが、どんな理由であれ、摂政アーロントは御子をこの呪いから開放する方法を見つけだすぞ」
languages.original_text: "And after this, I am supposed to give the Child to you?" {n}The old man hisses through the remains of his teeth.{/n} "This reeks of Felek's chicanery, and you fell for his tricks! Or perhaps you knew what would happen." {n}Theobald helplessly clenches his fists.{/n} "But, no matter, Regent Aaronto will find a way to rid the Child of this curse."

traits.locale_text: 「この後は、御子をお前に差し出さなくてはならないな？」{n}老人は残った歯のすきまからシューッと音を立てる。{/n}「これはフェレックによる詐術だ、まんまとはめられたな！それとも、承知の上だったのか」{n}シオボールドは力なく手を握りしめる。{/n}「だが、どんな理由であれ、リージェント・アーロントはこの呪われた御子を処分する方法を見つけだすぞ」
「そして、この後は、御子をあなたに差し出さなくてはなりませんと言うのですか？」{n}老人は残った歯のすきまからシューッと音を立てる。{/n}「これはフェレックによる詐術だ、まんまとはめられましたな！それとも、承知の上でしたのか」{n}シオボールドは力なく手を握りしめる。{/n}「だが、どんな理由であれ、摂政アーロントは御子をこの呪いから開放する方法を見つけだすぞ」

languages.text: « Et après ça, je suis censé vous donner l'Enfant ? {n}siffle le vieil homme entre les dernières dents qu'il lui reste.{/n} Ça empeste la traîtrise de Felek ! Vous vous êtes laissé duper par ses ruses, ou vous saviez pertinemment ce qui allait arriver. » {n}Théobald serre désespérément les poings.{/n} « Quoi qu'il en soit, le régent Aaronto trouvera un moyen de libérer l'Enfant de cette malédiction. »
languages.original_text: "And after this, I am supposed to give the Child to you?" {n}The old man hisses through the remains of his teeth.{/n} "This reeks of Felek's chicanery, and you fell for his tricks! Or perhaps you knew what would happen." {n}Theobald helplessly clenches his fists.{/n} "But, no matter, Regent Aaronto will find a way to rid the Child of this curse."

traits.locale_text: « Et après ça, je suis censé vous donner l'Enfant ? {n}siffle le vieil homme entre les dernières dents qu'il lui reste.{/n} Ça empeste la traîtrise de Felek ! Vous vous êtes laissé duper par ses ruses, ou vous saviez pertinemment ce qui allait arriver. » {n}Théobald serre désespérément les poings.{/n} « Quoi qu'il en soit, le régent Aaronto trouvera un moyen de libérer l'Enfant de cette malédiction. »

languages.text: "Und danach soll ich Euch das Kind überlassen?", {n}zischt der alte Mann durch seine verbliebenen Zähne.{/n} "Das riecht nach Feleks Machenschaften, und Ihr seid auf seine Tricks hereingefallen! Oder vielleicht wusstet Ihr auch, was passieren würde." {n}Theobald ballt hilflos die Fäuste.{/n} "Aber wie auch immer, Regent Aaronto wird einen Weg finden, das Kind von diesem Fluch zu befreien."
languages.original_text: "And after this, I am supposed to give the Child to you?" {n}The old man hisses through the remains of his teeth.{/n} "This reeks of Felek's chicanery, and you fell for his tricks! Or perhaps you knew what would happen." {n}Theobald helplessly clenches his fists.{/n} "But, no matter, Regent Aaronto will find a way to rid the Child of this curse."

traits.locale_text: "Und danach soll ich Euch das Kind überlassen?", {n}zischt der alte Mann durch seine verbliebenen Zähne.{/n} "Das riecht nach Feleks Machenschaften, und Ihr seid auf seine Tricks hereingefallen! Oder vielleicht wusstet Ihr auch, was passieren würde." {n}Theobald ballt hilflos die Fäuste.{/n}Aber wie auch immer, Regent Aaronto wird einen Weg finden, das Kind von diesem Fluch zu befreien."

languages.original_text: "And after this, I am supposed to give the Child to you?" {n}The old man hisses through the remains of his teeth.{/n} "This reeks of Felek's chicanery, and you fell for his tricks! Or perhaps you knew what would happen." {n}Theobald helplessly clenches his fists.{/n} "But, no matter, Regent Aaronto will find a way to rid the Child of this curse."

languages.text: "Bu yaptığından sonra, Çocuk'u sana vermemi mi bekliyorsun?" {n}İhtiyar adam, kalan dişlerinin arasından tıslıyor.{/n} "Bu işte kesin Felek'in parmağı var, belli ki sen de onun numaralarına aldanmışsın! Belki de böyle olacağını biliyordun." {n}Theobald, çaresizce yumruklarını sıkıyor.{/n} "Gerçi önemi yok. Naip Aaronto, Çocuk'u bu lanetten kurtarmanın yolunu bulur."
languages.original_text: "And after this, I am supposed to give the Child to you?" {n}The old man hisses through the remains of his teeth.{/n} "This reeks of Felek's chicanery, and you fell for his tricks! Or perhaps you knew what would happen." {n}Theobald helplessly clenches his fists.{/n} "But, no matter, Regent Aaronto will find a way to rid the Child of this curse."

traits.locale_text: "Bu yaptığından sonra, Çocuk'u sana vermemi mi bekliyorsun?" {n}İhtiyar adam, kalan dişlerinin arasından tıslıyor.{/n} "Bu işte kesin Felek'in parmağı var, belli ki sen de onun numaralarına aldanmışsın! Belki de böyle olacağını biliyordun." {n}Theobald, çaresizce yumruklarını sıkıyor.{/n} "Gerçi önemi yok. Naip Aaronto, Çocuk'u bu lanetten kurtarmanın yolunu bulur."
